Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Laser designator power fluctuation. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 11/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
